transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, this is Tansut, welcoming you to the first ever Space Ghost Coast to Coast 37th show anniversary celebration spectacular-mathon. Tonight, funny man Bobcat Goldthwait, and funny woman Judy Tenuta. And now, your friend and mine, that ghost host with the most, Spaaace Ghooost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in, coughing) Greetings, TV-watching citizens! I am Space Ghost, and I'm tickled pink to be here!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Tickled stupid, you mean.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares at Zorak, sniffs) Before we begin, let me introduce you to the director of tonight's festivities, that fabulous hot rock himself, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Audience
transcript.dialogue: (applause)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey, don't get up, really.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And, over here, we have my band leader, and indentured mantis-servant, Zorak, and the Original Way Outs! (Way Outs play a synthesized excerpt from "William Tell Overature") And we'd like to welcome you to... (takes deep breath) The first ever Space Ghost anniversary spectacular-mathon, uh, show.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Whoop de doodle do!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know, kids, tonight is a special notch in the belt that is the Space Ghost saga.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ehhh, Space Ghost, what anniversary is this, anyway?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Weren't you listening, Zorak? It's my 37th show anniversary! (smile sparkles)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I never heard of anybody celebrating their 37th anniversary before! It's dopey.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's not dopey! It's our 37th show! That's an anniversary, right? Darn tootin' it is! So, hap-hap-happy anniversary it is, and shut up Zorak, because you're not gonna rain on my charade.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Well, I don't know what I'm doing here, either.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (looks around)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looks around)

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (in recording booth, behind a window) They called me twenty minutes ago, shoved these notes in my hand, what do they expect? (microphone feedback increases in volume) Buncha morons!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Tansut?

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Let 'em fire me, I don't care.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tansut?

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, your mike's on, man.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhhh, fluff! Nobody showed me how to do this! (feedback increases again) (finally turns microphone off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh-kay! Let's get on with it, shall we? (invisos to desk, with new music) (Ding dong!) Say, I wonder who that could be?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's your first anniversary guest, Space Ghost, funny lady Judy Tenuta (she appears on control room monitor)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: I'm ready, honey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Judy! Welcome back to the show!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Oh-h-h-h-h-h! Space Ghost! I'm so excited!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me too!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oooh! Me too!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, Judy gal, what have you been doing since I last saw you?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Space Ghost, as you know, I rule the western hemisphere!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's nice, must keep you busy.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (plays accordion and sings) I rule, I rule, I rule.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Judy...

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Yeah!?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stuff a sock in it, Tenuta.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (dances with accordion, to weird background sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Judy, I've asked you to come back to celebrate my anniversary with me! Now, celebrate!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Ohhh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't sing, Judy.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (plays accordion and sings) Happy anniversary, happy anniversary, happy anniversary, Spaaaace Ghost! Oh-h-h-h-h-h! (spins around)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (grimaces)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Look at this! (swings her accordion up with her chest, then sits down)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Must I?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: I can make myself invisible. You cannot see me now! (puts her hands in front of her face)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yes I can.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: No-o-o-o-o! You cannot...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes I can! (aims his power bands at monitor)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: No! His rays cannot harm me, no-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (lowers his power bands, sighs)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (shaking her head back and forth, singing) Hair dance, hair dance, don't be a square, dance! Hair dance!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares back silently)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (full face on monitor, puckering for Space Ghost) (Smoooooch!)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmmm. Okay, I think it's time for Judy Jetson here to blast off.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Gotcha. (throws lever to send her away)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (still on studio monitor) Oh, you pig!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaah! Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I know, I know. (throws more levers, control room monitor changes several times, finally shows Tansut's booth)

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Uh, excuse me. Are we going to commercial now?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Oh, sorry, don't mind me. (Moltar throws lever, control room monitor shows static)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Ding dong!) Aha! Our next guest! (sniff sniff sniff sniff) Hey! I smell evil!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost...

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: ... It's your evil twin brother.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaaaah! Can't talk, Chad, I have a hernia!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Hey hey, relax, baby, like, I'm not here to spread terror.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Rats!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: I just wanted to swing by and check out the old Ghost Pad. You know, I had a real blast the last time I saw you, Taddles. A real blast. (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I bet you did. You and that creepy Elvira woman, pawwing each other. Yuck!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Oh, forget that chick, Taddy Bear, I already did. I'm looking for some new action, you dig? Some new kicks, know what I mean, butterbean?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not a whiff, Chad.

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Then let me clue ya, Tadville. I want to host the show again. (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh no, no no no no no!

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Okay Tad, be that way. Now I'm glad I left that surprise for you in your futon this morning. (evil laugh) B'da b'da! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, that was you, huh?

transcript.speaker: Chad Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'll be in touch. Later, cats 'n kittens! (purrs) (barks)

transcript.speaker: Moltar & Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in unison) Bye, Chad!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I like your brother.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You do not!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (reappears on monitor) Look at my cheekbones!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaaaah! Moltar, break!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (groans) Ten pounds of sausage in a five pound sack!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tansut!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Oh, uh, coming up next, more stuff!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (sings) Welcome back! (normal voice) Oooh! Hey! I nailed that one!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Ding dong!) What now, Birdman?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Relax, man, it's Bobcat. He's cool. (Bobcat is on control room monitor, waves at Moltar)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, it's special anniversary guest Bobcat Goldthwait.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: I tell ya, it's really been great here, to be back here, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's great to have you. So, it's my 37th show anniversary, Bobcat.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: You should slap yourself on the back.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He should slap himself in the face.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (slaps himself in the face)

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (laugh, then shrieking laugh, then starts to cry)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, Bob-a-rella, did ya bring me anything special for my anniversary?

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I brought you many things. (pause)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (smiles at camera)

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: I'm lyin', man, what can I get ya, you don't even wear slacks or trousers or pants, you know...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, that's okay, just as long as you don't sing me a stupid song or anything.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (starts making gibbering noises, shaking his head back and forth)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look out, I think he's gonna sing!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He's not gonna sing, Moltar. You're.. not gonna sing, are you, Bobcat?

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Yes I am.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhh brother.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Sing! Sing, you fool! Sing like a maniac! (shakes his arm)

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Okay. (takes a deep breath, then shouts) SPACE GHOST COAST TO COAST, SPACE GHOST COAST TO COAST, SPACE GHOST COAST TO COAST, AGH AGH AGH AGH AGH!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs)

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Could you buy the sincerity of that? Yeah, I, it really worked for me.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hmmmm, it had a good beat, and I could kill you to it. I give it a 75. (holding a sign with "75")

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: I'm tellin' ya, I'm gonna get up, and I'm gonna dope-slap that bug.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Fine! Fine!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Be my guest, Bobcat! Dope-slap away!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, I'm gonna dope-slap ya!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) O-o-o-o-h, I'm so frightened!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (makes face at Zorak) (to Space Ghost) How did you get a show with a cricket?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm a loc-, er, mantis!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Apparently, in, somewhere in show business, you shoulda went paper instead of scissors.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, look who's talking, the talk show arsonist!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: I'm serious, I will, I will clean that bug's clock so fast!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: You just tell him that, I, I, I personally put two of the Bugaloos in the hospital.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I think he heard you.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (exaggerated wink)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Um, look, Bobby-cat, I apologize about the bug.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Alright. Yah-yah-yah-yah-yah-yah-yah!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I try to make him behave, but...

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (looks to his right) Am I done, is that enough community service? (looks front and nods)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Any last words of anniversary wisdom for the little people at home?

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. (pounds fist into his palm) You gotta make your own fun, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Great.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: You gotta make your own fun.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I tried to make my own fun, look what it got me! Happy anniversary to me!

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (sticks his tongue out at Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whoop de doo. Moltar, are we done?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, we still got that cheap clip thing.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's right! This should be great, folks. It's a sparkling career retrospective to me! Space Ghost! Roll 'em!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever, countdown begins)

transcript.speaker: (Title screen shows
transcript.dialogue: "OUR MAN SPACE GHOST / THE DIRECTOR'S CUT", followed by numerous "Space Ghost" cartoon clips of him getting blasted, pounded, frozen, slammed, by numerous enemies)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was no sparkling tribute! That was terrible! That was... yuck! What in the name of Vic Tayback was that?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: A montage.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (French voice) Montage! French, hah? Well, that explains that, no, Moltar? (normal voice) Those French, they ruin everything! I mean, you give them an entire Disneyland, and they can't even make a dime off it. Even purple-butted baboons couldn't screw up a Disneyland! Hmmm! I tell ya, one day I oughta do somethin' about them French.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (French voice) I dare you! I double dare you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, I will! See if I don't! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (still making faces on the monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in cockpit) Ruin my anniversary, will ya?

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: (with French accent) Look out! It is zee Space Ghost! (Phantom Cruiser ray blasts city)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take that, you cheese eaters!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (French voice) Well, zat ees zat! Au reservoir, mon-sewers!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Bon soir! (throws lever, clip of Space Ghost being pounded into the ground reappears on monitor; title: Fin)

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (in French voice) You've been watching the Space Ghost Anniversary Spectacular-mathon, celebrating thirty-seven or so episodes of talk show whatchamacallit. From all of us here, to all of you, bon oui, what you say, a good night.

transcript.speaker: Bobcat Goldthwait
transcript.dialogue: (shrieking laugh)
